page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The majority of people in Firle are employed on the estate. Other jobs include: carpentry, teaching, shop workers, home_helps, librarians, secretaries, window_cleaners, odd_jobs, gardeners, drivers, farmers, postmen, designers, playground attendents, cooks, baby_ sitters, milkmen, paperboys, fish marketing, house keeping, watch repairer, writer, vicar, writer, editor, surveyor, brick layer, architect, local government officer. In Firle quite a lot of people are pensioners. Very few are un-employed.
